desc: 测试查询出差申请本子属性的案例
name: SelectTravelSelfProperties
desc: 测试点：测试含子属性字段的查询

oqls.desc: 根据创建人列表（仅父属性），返回的值作为一个整体
oqls.name: SelectTravelCreatorListById
oqls.oql: select creator from Travel where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: select CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_KEY from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 查询创建人列表（子属性展开），返回的值作为一个整体
oqls.name: SelectTravelExpandCreatorListById
oqls.oql: select creator(name, key) from Travel where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: select CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_KEY from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 查询创建人列表（子属性单独），返回的值作为单独的两列
oqls.name: SelectTravelSingleCreatorListById
oqls.oql: select creator.name, creator.key from Travel where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: select CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_KEY from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据创建人（子属性单独 ）查询出差列表
oqls.name: SelectTravelListBySingleCreator
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel where creator.name = '张三' and creator.key = 'zhangsan'
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL where CREATOR_NAME = '张三' and CREATOR_KEY = 'zhangsan'

oqls.desc: 根据创建人（子属性单独 ）查询出差列表（带变量）
oqls.name: SelectTravelListBySingleCreatorVars
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel where creator.name = #{creator.name} and creator.key = #{creator.key}
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL where CREATOR_NAME = #{creator.name} and CREATOR_KEY = #{creator.key}
